title: Little Tom Thumb
creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The dream of escaping from poverty and unhappiness comes true when Little Tom Thumb becomes a hero - saving himself and his six big brothers, and returning home with treasure and magic boots. Animation by Harold Whitaker.
creator_credit_for_label: Joy Batchelor, Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
